news.title: Mosque terror plot suspect is Sinn Féin activist who attended party conference addressed by Catherine Connolly
news.summary: A far-right terrorism suspect in a plot to attack a mosque is a Sinn Féin activist.

news.title: Former inter-county GAA referee Thomas Howard jailed for more than six years for indecently assaulting niece when she was a child
news.summary: A prominent former GAA referee has been sentenced to six years and nine months for indecently assaulting his niece from when she was three or four years old until she reached puberty.

news.title: Sister of man killed in hit-and-run tells driver in court: ‘You left my brother to die like a dog’
news.summary: The sister of a man killed by a disqualified driver in a hit-and-run, told the defendant in court: “You left my brother to die like a dog in the road.”

news.title: Ireland v Australia: Sam Prendergast ‘deserves start’ says Andy Farrell as Paddy McCarthy gets green light
news.summary: Sam Prendergast has been recalled to the Ireland team for Saturday night’s clash with Australia at the Aviva Stadium (KO 8.10, Live RTÉ2/TNT Sports) and Andy Farrell will give the out-half’s former Ireland U-20s teammate Paddy McCarthy his first start.

news.title: Met Éireann issues both Status Orange and Yellow rain and wind warnings for 16 counties
news.summary: Forecasters have issued a Status Orange rain warning for three counties tomorrow.

news.title: Five things we learnt from the new Epstein files
news.summary: Republicans released 23,000 documents pertaining to Jeffrey Epstein, including a raft of emails in which Donald Trump is mentioned.

news.title: Pól Ó Conghaile: The best Christmas markets in Europe, and my travel tips for a seasonal trip
news.summary: Grilled bratwursts or gooey raclette. Warming mugs of gluhwein in your mitts. Sugary chimney cakes. Puffy pierogi.

news.title: ‘The financial and emotional toll has been immense’ – families battling for five years to move into new homes face new hurdle
news.summary: For the second time in two years, families and couples who signed contracts for new houses in a Co Meath estate have been summoned to a Dublin hotel.

news.title: Housing Minister James Browne accused of ‘fleeing the country’ as opposition criticises new housing plan in Dáil
news.summary: Housing Minister James Browne has been accused of “fleeing the country” and “running scared” instead of defending the Government’s new plan to tackle the growing crisis.

news.title: ‘All she did was try to help’ – siblings testify that brother accused of killing their mother was abusive to her and once broke her jaw
news.summary: A man told gardaí, "I didn't kill the b***h", when they put an allegation to him that he had killed his 75-year-old mother, a Central Criminal Court jury heard this afternoon.
